original_title: 万引き主婦 通報しない代わりに生中出しのお仕置きをしたら翌日もお仕置き志願にやってきたドMすぎる公務員の妻 小梅えな
overview: A civil servant husband who is so concerned about career advancement and appearance that he severely restricts his wife's behavior. His wife, who was stressed by her husband's unreasonable arguments, shoplifted at the supermarket out of sheer urgency, but she was easily guided. The wife, who thought that it would be a big problem if her husband found out, ended up having vaginal cum shot sex at the office in order to ask for his forgiveness. However, the loneliness-hungry wife wants punishment from the store manager so much that she ends up shoplifting the next day.
title: Instead Of Reporting His Wife For Shoplifting, He Scolds Her With A Creampie Instead. The Next Day, She Comes Back For More. Civil Servant's Sub Wife Ena Koume
